extendedInfo.description: Ingo, cha-ching-go. Way to go. Youâre officially one step closer to easy money. Weâre pretty sure youâre going to love using Ingo. After all, Ingo is so simple. Just download the Ingo app, create a simple profile, register your participating VISA prepaid card, and take a picture of your check to send it to Ingo for approval.  If we approve the check, it will be loaded on your VISA prepaid card in minutes for a reasonable fee.  Once Ingo loads the money from an approved check, itâs yours to spend - Ingo will never reverse the load, even if the check is bad.  How great is that? Ingo can review any type of check for approval up to $2,500, whether itâs from your employer, your neighbor, your customer, the seventeen parents in your childâs class at school, or even your Great Aunt June. Not only that, Ingo is also there when you need it. Just tap the app and Ingo, cha-ching-go. FEATURES:Money on your terms. Good Funds in Minutes: When you need access to your money in minutes, choose Good Funds in Minutes.  If your check is approved, Ingo will load your check in minutes less a 1% fee for printed payroll and government checks, or a 4% fee for all other checks. Weâll do the math for you, so youâll always know the fee before you agree to load your check. Good Funds in Days: If you donât need your money for a few days, choose Ingoâs free option, Good Funds in Days. Weâll load the funds from your check onto your card for free in 7 days if we approve the check and it hasn't returned in 7 days.HISTORY: View real-time transaction history and see images of the checks youâve loaded. ACCESS:Register, add and delete cards, and edit your profile all within the app. HELP: Around-the-clock free and awesome customer support. Ingo is available for use with the following families of Visa Prepaid Cards:AccountNow Rushcard UPsidePaychekPLUS!*Blue EliteNew cards are being added all the time.*If you have any problems enrolling your PaychekPLUS card please contact customer service at 866-984-4357 for further assistance.Ingo is owned and operated by Ingo Money, Inc. as an agent of PreCash, Inc.  All checks subject to approval by Ingo prior to loading.  Additional Terms and Conditions apply, available at http://www.ingomoney.com.

reviews.title: This company is horrible.
reviews.comment: I tried many times to upload my check.  It took 8 times to accept the pictures then denied it 3 times for no reason just saying_\"something doesn\'t look right\".  Then finally said the check is too old.  It is a 14 day old payroll check.  I called customer service and they say checks cannot be more than 5 days old.  What BS\'!!!!!  Don\'t use this it is not worth the aggravation.
reviews.author: Vicki Malanga

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: This app don\'t work half the time and the other half they don\'t want to find money over $300 without a 7 day wait if I could I would give it no stars
reviews.author: Mark Burkett

reviews.title: Very gud n reliable.
reviews.comment: Cant complain
reviews.author: Lawanda Baytops

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I am able to load checks to my debit card in a few minutes. It saves time and for a tiny fee, it saves the stress of long lines and poor customer service.
reviews.author: Michael Childers

reviews.comment: Took a lot of pictures in different lightening and still no solution and then called the customer service rep who by the way was very nice and helpful but i have to wait to be contacted this is hot mess so far no good rates but the customer service rep gets a five star for effort
reviews.author: Shaniqua Crawley

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: This app disables the flash on the camera.  If Ingo would allow the camera to flash when taking the picture of the check, it would capture a perfect image.
reviews.author: Alvin Napoleon

reviews.title: Terrible!!
reviews.comment: This app is terrible!! The first few times i used it, it took about an hour to go through and they were payroll checks! There are no set amounts on what they take from your check, it seems the less the check the more they take, doesnt make sense! I had loaded a $600 check and they took $7, then i tried a a $300 they wanted $17 then i had one for $400 they wanted $12. Now its telling my im not logged in or gps issues! Ill just go to the bank, they charge less!! App sucks!!!
reviews.author: Kevin Ammoune

reviews.title: No camera functions
reviews.comment: Needs to be able to access or upload from the actual camera app in order to get a good picture since current version won\'t accept wide checks without focus changes
reviews.author: Kevin Doolittle

reviews.title: must useless app ever
reviews.comment: I have currently 9 different prepaid cards in my name.....all very popular.... this doesn\'t work with any of them what\'s the point then
reviews.author: Cody h

reviews.title: MS.ROCK
reviews.comment: I had been using this app and now i can\'t use It say something about my location but I been using it this app SUCKS!!!! :-(.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: Won\'t even open. Have un installed and re installed multiple times. Zero stars. I put it on my ipod also, it opened one time and let me register. Hasn\'t worked on either device since. Still bad
reviews.author: Brandi Blaker

reviews.title: Excelllent
reviews.comment: Had problems at first. But they have fixed them.  So is good to have
reviews.author: Andreiona Hume

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very cool and convenient application.
reviews.author: Randy Douglas

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: This is convenient.
reviews.author: Marcus Robinson

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: They finally worked the kinks out. It\'s a great app!
reviews.author: tiff tim

reviews.title: UNSTABLE AS HELL!!!!
reviews.comment: Works when it wants to. Everything was fine for a while, then my tablet upgraded......now I get the OOOPS! Message. I never got a chance to see if this could cash my checks. The old app is far superior to this one. I give it 1star for effort.
reviews.author: qontez george

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: I have the galaxy 4, and I can\'t even get the app to open. It keeps telling me that I\'m not connected to the network when I am. I even tried over WiFi, but the same message came up..... please fix this!
reviews.author: aundrea holland

reviews.title: Disappointed!!
reviews.comment: I read all these great reviews and was super excited for this app both my husband and I have rush cards so should be good.  My father in law sent my husband a check for my daughter\'s bday.  Tried to deposit it came back error & said that my husband could not write a check too him self?? They dont take one party checks.. clearly both names are different except the last name...so now my daughter gets to wait 7 days days for her bday $ cust service cld not help & the girl last night spouted off randomness! :(
reviews.author: Candy Earp

reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
reviews.comment: I had some trouble loading a check after a software update, and called tech support. They were incredibly helpful and directed me to the people who could help me figure out what was wrong. Turns out there was an issue with the image processing and they were able to pinpoint and fix the issue. Then I had an issue with the load going onto my card, which turns out was the CARD companys issue, not Ingos, but they worked with me to get my card company to fix the problem, and touched base with me several times throughout to make sure I was getting help and answers. Friday I was able to load my paycheck FLAWLESSLY and in less then 5 minutes. They even called me after to make sure everything went OK and that I was happy. Some bumps in the road since downloading, but the A+++ customer service more then made up for it - and now the app works PERFECT for me! Thanks :-)
reviews.author: Eva Marie Sawyer

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: This app is great and convenient!!!! Way cheaper and faster than waiting in line to cash a check!!!
reviews.author: LaShonda Ray
